mapper.update:
update PRM_TASK_B
PK_TASK = #{pk_task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_ORDER = #{plan_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECTID_CODE = #{projectid_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECTID_NAME = #{projectid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACT_ORDER = #{fact_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CROWNO = #{crowno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECT_STATUS = #{project_status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECT_CONTENT = #{project_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUDGE_STANDARD = #{judge_standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLLING_VALUE = #{polling_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLLING_RESULT = #{polling_value,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PIC_URL = #{pic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPLETE_TIME = #{complete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERRDESCRIBE = #{errdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RDBVALUE = #{rdbvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id}

update PRM_TASK_B set PK_TASK = #{pk_task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_ORDER = #{plan_order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROJECTID = #{projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECTID_CODE = #{projectid_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECTID_NAME = #{projectid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACT_ORDER = #{fact_order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CROWNO = #{crowno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROJECT_STATUS = #{project_status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROJECT_CONTENT = #{project_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUDGE_STANDARD = #{judge_standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLLING_VALUE = #{polling_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POLLING_RESULT = #{polling_result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PIC_URL = #{pic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMPLETE_TIME = #{complete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERRDESCRIBE = #{errdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDBVALUE = #{rdbvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from PRM_TASK_B where DR=0
and PK_TASK = #{search.searchMap.id}
order by plan_order,crowno

select
from PRM_TASK_B where PK_TASK = #{id} and DR=0

SELECT PLANB.PK_ER_PROJECT PROJECTID, PLANB.ER_PROJECT_CODE PROJECTID_CODE, PLANB.ER_PROJECT_NAME PROJECTID_NAME, PROJECTB.CPRJCONTENT PROJECT_CONTENT, PROJECTB.CJUDSTD JUDGE_STANDARD, PLANB.PLAN_ORDER PLAN_ORDER, PROJECTB.CROWNO CROWNO FROM PRM_PLAN PLAN INNER JOIN PRM_PLAN_B PLANB ON PLAN.ID = PLANB.PK_PLAN INNER JOIN PRM_PROJECT_B PROJECTB ON PLANB.PK_ER_PROJECT = PROJECTB.CPARENTID WHERE PLANB.DR = 0 AND PROJECTB.DR = 0 AND PLAN.ID = #{planid} order by PLANB.PLAN_ORDER,PROJECTB.CROWNO
select b.* from prm_task_b b inner join prm_task h on b.pk_task = h.id where b.dr=0 and h.dr=0 and (billstatus = 1 or billstatus = 2) and h.postid = #{postid}

select
b.pk_task pk_task, b.plan_order plan_order, b.projectid projectid, b.projectid_code projectid_code, b.projectid_name projectid_name, b.fact_order fact_order, b.crowno crowno, b.project_status project_status, b.project_content project_content, b.judge_standard judge_standard, b.polling_value polling_value, b.polling_result polling_result, b.pic_url pic_url, b.id id, b.tenantid tenantid, b.sysid sysid, b.orgid orgid, b.orgid_name orgid_name, b.ts ts, b.dr dr, b.creator creator, b.creationtime creationtime, b.modifier modifier, b.modifiedtime modifiedtime, b.creator_name creator_name, b.modifier_name modifier_name, b.errdescribe errdescribe, pb.fvaluetype fvaluetype
from prm_task h left join prm_task_b b on h.id=b.pk_task left join prm_project_b pb on b.projectid=pb.id where b.dr=0 and h.dr=0 and (pb.dr=0 or pb.dr is null) and (billstatus = 1 or billstatus = 2) and h.id in
#{item}
order by PLAN_ORDER
mapper.update:
begin
update PRM_TASK_B
PK_TASK = #{item.pk_task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_ORDER = #{item.plan_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECTID = #{item.projectid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECTID_CODE = #{item.projectid_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECTID_NAME = #{item.projectid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACT_ORDER = #{item.fact_order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CROWNO = #{item.crowno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECT_STATUS = #{item.project_status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROJECT_CONTENT = #{item.project_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUDGE_STANDARD = #{item.judge_standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POLLING_VALUE = #{item.polling_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PIC_URL = #{item.pic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID = #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTID = #{item.tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSID = #{item.sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{item.orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID_NAME = #{item.orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TS = #{item.ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DR = #{item.dr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATIONTIME = #{item.creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{item.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDTIME = #{item.modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPLETE_TIME = #{item.complete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_NAME = #{item.creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_NAME = #{item.modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERRDESCRIBE = #{item.errdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RDBVALUE = #{item.rdbvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{item.id}
;end;
